name: Add Guest from Add New Members dialog

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Add Guest from Add New Members dialog
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Ensure there is a Guest User present on the system say Guest1 who is removed from all the teams/channels.
  2. Now Login as a Sysadmin and navigate to a Channel.
  3. Click on Manage Members and then click on Add New Members button
  4. Search for Guest1
inline.expectedResult: • Guest1 user should not be shown in the search results in Add New Members Dialog

customFields.Related ticket(s): Guest Accounts: Guest User should not be shown in the list while Adding New Members to a Channel — MM-19357
